name: Pet Ashley (the game)
description:
[SPACE] or [CLICK] to pet Ashley.

I made this game waaay before Interactive Mrs. Pizza, and I decided to share it for people who wanted to play it! I guess you can say this inspired IMP, heh.

Oh yeah, there's a secret at 2,500 pets. Good luck.

Ashley is owned by SquigglyTuff.
